document_data.name: Renoen
document_data.mainbody: '''Renoen''', also known as '''Renoen the Fair''', was a councilor that served in the [[Dale Council]] in [[High Dale]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. She was known in [[Highcastle]] for her remarkable beauty and charm. Furthermore, she was also well recognized as being the only [[wizard]] of any real significance within the dale.
